title: TDP-10 | 2021-W42 | Weekly TDP (Treasury Distribution Proposal)
body:
# Overview
In an effort to provide consistency with our TDPs (Treasury Distribution Proposals), I advocate that we adopt a weekly TDP and attempt to plan a week in advance.

We can look at this as establishing a “Best Practice” while embracing our “Full Transparency” founding principles.

The goal is to refine token rewards to incentivize solid contributions that move our community forward and most accurately reward efforts for any work done.

# Weekly DAO Business

## [1.0] Communications


### [1.1] Weekly REtoken Report
> *Would like to see us implement a "Weekly REtoken Report" where we focus on weekly Real Estate Tokenization news. I'm actually going to make a proposal to "Roadmap this" for 2021-Q4.*

## [2.0] New DRAFT Proposals &/or Created in Snapshot


## [3.0] Weekly Recurring Events

### [3.1] Core Team Weekly Planning Session
- call length: 1hr
- 50 $RETOKEN for call host
- 25 $RETOKEN for call participants

### [3.2] Community Call

#### [3.2.1] Hosts

##### Call Owner | Primary Host
- 100 $RETOKEN / ea (1 person)

#### [3.2.2] Co-Host(s)
- 75 $RETOKEN / ea (up to 2)

##### Expectations
- see https://trello.com/c/tncyYLqJ
- 30min planning call with hosts ideally facilitated on Discord so that others may participate scheduled using sesh bot

### [3.2.3] Participants:
- up to 25 $RETOKEN that can be rewarded by hosts for active participation in the Community Call (IE: emoji voting on a poll)
- 10 $RETOKEN for "Special Guests"

#### Expectations
- events RSVP using “sesh bot created event” in “Official REtoken DAO Discord” events channel
- engage in host directed activities to receive indicated amount of $RETOKEN
- obtain event POAP
- by holding $RETOKEN you are agreeing to the token policy in [RIP-1](link)

## [4.0] Misc Opportunities to earn $RETOKEN

### [4.1] Various ~30min tasks awarding 10 $RETOKEN


### [4.2] Various ~1hr tasks awarding 25 $RETOKEN


### [4.3] New "HowTo" Processes


## [5.0] Working Groups

### [5.1] Working Group Name Here

# Vote
* Yes - I approve
* No - is unreasonable
